product_description: A modern, AI-powered task management platform that helps teams collaborate more effectively and get more done
target_audience: Small to medium-sized teams (5-50 people) in technology companies who need better project coordination
problem_statement: Teams struggle with fragmented communication, unclear priorities, and lack of visibility into project progress, leading to missed deadlines and reduced productivity
proposed_solution: An integrated task management system with AI-powered prioritization, real-time collaboration features, and intelligent insights
success_metrics: 10,000 active users within 6 months of launch
Average task completion rate improvement of 30%
Average session time of 25+ minutes per day
technical_requirements: Automated CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
dependencies: Third-party AI/ML API for task prioritization (e.g., OpenAI)
risks: AI model accuracy for task prioritization may not meet user expectations
Competition from established players (Asana, Monday.com, Jira)
